alert.note: Alert for Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:58PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 358 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Freeman, or 25 miles east of Gila Bend, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeman and Big Horn. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 128 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
